name: Cube Creator 3D
description:
The NEW 1.2 Update features include eShop store access where upgrades to acquire coop/competitive local multiplayer and eight new texture packs are ready to be activated. The update also includes a new magic wand for projectile combat, a 3rd-person camera, and the addition of flags. Add any and all of these texture packs to enhance your crafting experience: sweets, crystal, sci-fi, woolly, dystopian, ice world, and jungle.

Craft your own realm in stunning randomly generated worlds in Cube Creator 3D. You can also gather resources, combine elements, explore & combat strange creatures to survive in this expansive, cubic domain.

Creative Mode allows you to explore worlds in true Stereoscopic 3D. The dual-screen presentation keeps your resource inventory free from cluttering the gameplay screen. Easy-to-use touchscreen controls make the open-world gameplay better than ever. Break-through dynamic lighting & effects positions Cube Creator 3D a 'cube' above the rest.

In Survival Mode, players can explore, craft, mine, & battle in one of the expansive environments: forest, desert, mountain, tundra, fantasia, and inferno worlds. To start, you must use only your bare hands to gather resources to then craft tools & weapons, & to build protective shelters. Building better tools & weapons allows you to explore caves, mine their precious ores, & combat the many malicious monsters. Craft, explore and conquer these voxel worlds.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
